snippet: Pope Francis has praised his two saintly predecessors on several occasions, hailing them as models for the faithful who inspire with their goodness and "heroic" virtues. Here's what he has said:...

headline.print_headline: Francis Praises Saintly Popes as Good, Heroic
headline.main: Francis Praises Saintly Popes as Good, Heroic

lead_paragraph: Pope Francis has praised his two saintly predecessors on several occasions, hailing them as models for the faithful who inspire with their goodness and "heroic" virtues. Here's what he has said:
